item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: This page provides an example of using R Markdown. Code block x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 2.14 ## 2 2 0.28 ## 3 3 2.65 ## 4 4 5.03 ## 5 5 5.60 ## 6 6 6.24 ## 7 7 6.49 ## 8 8 7.22 ## 9 9 9.49 ## 10 10 9.90
